definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The scholarship and research grants distribution is as appendix table 1.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金和奖教金具体分布详请见附件1。

sentences.english: But this does not vitiate his scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 但这不会威胁到他的奖学金。

sentences.english: Scholarships will be canceled for those who cannot pass the health examination.
sentences.chinese: 入学体检不合格者，奖学金资格将被取消。

sentences.english: He applied for a scholarship and won it at last.
sentences.chinese: 他申请了奖学金并终于获准。

sentences.english: That scholarship is designed for foreign students.
sentences.chinese: 那项奖学金是为外国学生设立的。

sentences.english: He's been wait-listed for a football scholarship to Stanford .
sentences.chinese: 他已被列入斯坦福大学的美式足球奖学金等候者名单。

sentences.english: Yes, I won the full scholarship when I was a sophomore.
sentences.chinese: 得过，在我大二时得过全额奖学金。

sentences.english: Assistantships are just jobs paid with money or free classes.
sentences.chinese: 研究生助教奖学金是支付金钱或者免费课程的工作。

sentences.english: This year we will be inviting applications for 2006 scholarships.
sentences.chinese: 2006年度的志奋领奖学金项目开始接受申请。

sentences.english: Do I qualify for the scholarship to England?
sentences.chinese: 我符合留英奖学金的资格吗？

sentences.english: Now, Hamilton College in Clinton, N.Y., says it will phase out merit scholarships altogether.
sentences.chinese: 纽约克林顿市的哈密尔顿学院说它将逐步淘汰奖学金。

sentences.english: The result has a great effect on my recept of scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 这个结果对我得到奖学金有很大的影响。

sentences.english: Fergus won a scholarship to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 弗格斯获得了上剑桥大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: In school, my grades were excellent, won first-class university in scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 在校期间，我成绩优异，获得过校级一等奖学金。

sentences.english: Dean aim to study on a scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 狄恩打算用功以得奖学金。

sentences.english: BLCU has bought insurance of accidents and hospitalization for scholarship students.
sentences.chinese: 学校为奖学金生办理意外伤害和住院医疗保险。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to recommend sb for postgraduate studies/to admit for postgraduate studies without taking the entrance exam
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
to work part time while studying/work-study program
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
